channel.title: Project Discover™ – Settings
channel.description: Recent content in Settings on Project Discover™

item.title: Docs: Branding
item.description:
Can I adjust the Application Branding

Yes. In the General section you can change the application title.

Can I adjust the Welcome Screen

Yes. The Welcome screen has the following structure:

  • A title
  • A sub-title
  • 3 sections describing the application capabilities. Each of them has an icon associated, and is made of a title and a description
  • A background image

    • You can change all text, upload new image and icons, to brand your own landing page.

item.title: Docs: General
item.description:
Here you can configure the necessary TIBCO Cloud components used to manage the lifecycle of Process analysis.

Messaging

The following TIBCO Cloud Messaging configurations are required

  • Messaging endpoint
  • Messaging API Key

    • Those elements can be found in your TIBCO Cloud Messaging subscription

    Integration

    The following TIBCO Cloud Integration configurations are required

  • Integration endpoint

    • Those elements can be found in your TIBCO Cloud Integration subscription

    Live Apps

    The following TIBCO Cloud Live Apps configurations are required

  • Application used to manage the Process Analysis lifecycle
  • Creator used to create cases of the above

    • Those elements can be found in your TIBCO Cloud Live Apps subscription

item.title: Docs: Analytics
item.description:
Enable Web Authoring

Spotfire Web Authoring can get toggled on or off

Note: this capability requires the web authoring role on Spotfire.

Spotfire Server Configuration

The default Spotfire server is TIBCO Cloud Spotfire.
However you can toggle that settings off and enter the URL of your own managed server.

item.title: Docs: Database
item.description: You can specify the details of the Database used to store the output of the process mining.

item.title: Docs: Orchestration
item.description: You can specify the details of the spark orchestrator responsible for running process mining on the backend.

item.title: Docs: Process Mining
item.description: You can specify the details of the spark orchestrator responsible for running process mining on the backend.

item.title: Docs: Add-On's
item.description:
The following add-ons are available

  • TIBCO Data Virtualization (TDV)

    • Why to use TDV

    TIBCO Data Virtualization helps you access, combine and provision your event logs data from your supporting systems.

    TIBCO DV allows you to:

  • Connect to your operational systems using of our 200+ connectors
  • Create virtual views of your data ready to be consumed by analytics and process mining. No more complex ETL needed, your data doesn't need to move!
  • Federate multiple sources as your business processes touch multiple operational systems.
  • Deliver High performance access to your data.

    • How to configure TDV

    You can use your own managed TIBCO Data Virtualization and bring your data to the solution.

    Use this setting screen to configure:

  • The URL and port of the Business Directory Server. Note that a proxy is needed to allow the Web Application to access Business Directory APIs hosted on a different domain. Configure that proxy to allow CORS headers.
  • The port of your TDV Server. Please remember to white list the IP address of your TDV server so that it can be reached from the backend. The hostname of your TDV server is not needed here because it is provided dynamically by the Business Directory Server as you pick views.
  • Username and password to access the above.
